document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 216''' was released in July of 2013 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.The Sun Never Rises:
: ''By [[Shawn Merwin]], illustrated by [[Beth Trott]], [[Chippy]], [[Chris Seaman]], [[William Oâ€™Connor]], [[Tyler Jacobson]], [[Howard Lyon]], and [[Emrah Elmasli]], Cartography by [[Jason Engle]].'' '''p. 37-55'''
[[Drow]] have taken hostages in the temple of the sun god, and it'll take more than diplomacy to win the day. This D&D adventure was originally run at Winter Fantasy 2012 as a tease for the ''[[Rise of the Underdark]]'' series of D&D Encounters seasons. Module for 6 PC's of level 1.
